column1: prompt

Update the script with a better ending. The script so far:
John and Mary have been together for a year now. Everything is perfect. But when John goes to pick Mary up in the evening, he notices that she is not her usual self. He questions her and discovers that she has been feeling isolated and apprehensive.
Correct the grammar of the sentence The car ran it's engine.
From the input text, identify all pronouns used. Goldfish are common pets that require little maintenance.
Perform a web search and find a source that discusses the negative effects of social media.
Create two examples demonstrating how to use the verb "juggle" in a sentence.
Classify the following items as an animal, plant, or mineral. A tree
Output the solution to the following equation: 10/2+3
Translate "Où sont les toilettes ? " to English
Connect the given sentences without changing their meaning. The project is late. The client is unhappy.
Generate a step-by-step procedure for making a cup of tea.
Insert the phrase "By all means" in the following sentence. We can skip the introduction if there is not enough time.
Write a paragraph that describes a time when you achieved a difficult goal.
As a customer service agent, explain why it is important to use positive language when dealing with customers.
Rewrite the sentence so that it means the same, but contains a stronger verb. The company grew quickly.
Write a one sentence that summarizes the main idea of a given article. Here is the article about the human microbiome.
Suggest a topic for a persuasive essay about the importance of mental health.

Given two recipes, list two ingredients that are used in both recipes. Recipe 1: Coconut Rice
Ingredients: Rice, Coconut, Water

Recipe 2: Curry Chicken
Ingredients: Chicken, Curry Powder, Onion
Create a title for a story about a wizard who discovers a power greater than magic.
Add one sentence to this paragraph to make it more interesting. John graduated college last year. He started a new job in a large city and is a very successful employee.
Compare and contrast these two words: autonomy and independence.
Describe a friend of yours using a simile.
Convert this sentence from a declarative sentence to an interrogative sentence. He is going to the park.
Imagine you are talking to a friend, who is stressed and needs to relax. Come up with a creative way to suggest they take some time out of their day to take a break.
Write a sentence using a metaphor to describe the feeling of being overwhelmed.
Describe a place from your own experience in vivid detail, using as much sensory language as possible.
What would be the best way to remove a stain from a white dress?
What is a useful tool to help people stay productive during the working day?
How can I make a delicious keto-friendly dinner?
What can I use to store books so they don't take up too much space?
What should I consider when choosing a couch?
What are the benefits of adopting a habit of journaling?
How can I make a classic Manhattan cocktail?
What can I do to reduce the costs of hosting a website?
How can I properly clean a wooden cutting board?
What should I do to find the best lawyer in my area?
What is the best way to train a cat to use the litter box?
What is the most effective way to motivate myself to exercise?
How can I keep my house cool in the heat?
Give a few examples of bias in machine learning models.
Identify five tips to improve computer security.
Generate a list of five creative gifts for a seven-year-old.

Restate the following sentence using a formal tone.
"It's gonna be really fun!"
Create a program that can detect potential fraudulent activity.

Rewrite the following sentence to use the third person point of view.
"I don't understand this concept."
Edit the following sentence grammatically and semantically I eating dinner
Generate a list of 10 items one would need to prepare a simple sandwich
Retell the classic story of "Little Red Riding Hood" in one short paragraph
List 5 safety practices to observe while handling a hot oven
Generate 3 pros and 3 cons for visiting a new city
Rewrite the sentence “He’s an excellent surgeon” to make it sound more impressive. He's an excellent surgeon
Group the words "pencil," "eraser," "ruler," "compass," and "calculator" into two categories.
Describe the setting of an enchanted forest.
Generate a list of questions for a job interview for a Sales Manager.
Identify a possible theme for a children's party.
Create a multiple choice question with three possible answers.
Rewrite the sentence "I always wanted to try bungee jumping." to make it sound more exciting. I always wanted to try bungee jumping.
Generate a deeper understanding of the idiom "bringing home the bacon".
Rewrite the sentence "There was a light rain" so that it is more lyrical. There was a light rain
Categorize the words "whale," "dolphin," "shark," "clam," and "crab" according to their biological classification.
Transform the string in the input field to the a camel case, i.e., the first letter of the words should be capitalized, except the first letter in the entire string. hello_world
Count the number of characters in the input text. This is an example of a sentence.

Find out the time difference between the first and second timestamps. Timestamp 1: Mon Jun 15 2020 12:54:03
Timestamp 2: Mon Jun 15 2020 14:22:19

Calculate the area of a right triangle given the base and height. Base = 5
Height = 4
Re-order the integer list given in the input field such that all odd numbers are first and even numbers are last. [2, 3, 8, 45, 6, 99, 72]
Convert the Fahrenheit temperature given in the input to Celsius. Temperature in Fahrenheit: 109
Delete the specified element from the list. List: [3, 4, 8, 5, 9], Element = 8
Find the season corresponding to the given month. Month = June
Introduce yourself in a creative way.
Design a product that would make cleaning easier.
Find an interesting article and summarize it in a paragraph. https://www.theverge.com/2020/5/14/21257410/ai-generative-models-text-music-graphics
Pick two colors and explain what emotions they evoke. Blue and yellow
Come up with a sentence in which alliteration is used.
Explain why you believe in a particular cause. Ending global poverty.
What characteristics do effective leaders possess?
Provide a list of 20 synonyms for happy.
Identify the cumulative adjectives in the phrase "a tall, dark, and handsome man".
Describe a memorable summer experience that you had when you were younger.
Generate a poem using a metaphor.
What are the implications of this development? Scientists have recently diagnosed a new virus, Coronavirus, which is highly contagious and can quickly spread.
Speculate what might happen in the future? Electric vehicles will become more common across the world.
Provide two methods to solve this problem. How to reduce energy consumption?
What is this law about? The California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)
What would be a possible solution to this issue? There is an increasing number of homeless people in the city.
Identify the tone of this sentence. Output "positive", "negative" or "neutral". This job is very demanding.
Rewrite the sentence starting with a new word. They are in desperate need of help.

Summarize this article on the mathematics of movie production. The mathematics of motion picture production is a complex mix of art, science and craft. The mathematics of bringing movies to life through production is studied by Hollywood professionals in order to understand the entire process of getting a film from the script and into theaters.

Calculate the average rating for this product using the following reviews. Review 1: 3 Stars
Review 2: 4 Stars
Review 3: 5 Stars
Translate the word 'giraffe' to French.
